mods.abstract: Response to a comment of C. P. Flynn to Sharp Photon-Induced np - (n+1)s Resonances in Xe and Kr Monolayers Observed by Spin-Resolved Electron Spectroscopy in Physical Review Letters 57, 267 (1986).
